{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-MR3420 |revision=v2 |upc=320127552672 |asin=B003WK62OS |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router |fcc_date=10/30/2012 |fcc_id=TE7MR3420V2 |ic_id=8853A-MR3420 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=E8:DE:27,64:70:02 |oui_eth=E8:DE:27,64:70:02 }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 3G/4G Router}} :WLAN: 802.11bgn 2T2R 2.4GHz (300Mbps) :Antenna: 2x 5dBi external (RP-SMA) :Ports: 1x WAN FE, 4x LAN FE, 1x USB 2.0 :Compatible with UMTS/HSPA/EVDO USB Modem The Flash appears to be a ''Spansion'' S25FL032PIF (4MB) Possible 64:70:02 (''TP-LINK'') OUI (in the FCC photos) *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-mr3420#info ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Model:		MR3420			MR3420
Version:	1/1.1/1.2		2.3
Manufacturer:	Atheros 		Atheros
Bootloader:	U-Boot			U-Boot
Architecture:	MIPS 24Kc		MIPS 74Kc
System-On-Chip:	Atheros AR7241@400MHz	Atheros AR9341@535MHz
Flash chip:	Macronix MX25L3206E/	Winbond W25Q32BV/
		cFeon F32-100HIP	Spansion FL032PIF
Flash size:	4 MiB 			4 MiB
RAM chip:	Zentel A3S56D40FTP-G5	Winbond W9425G6JH-5
RAM size:	32 MiB	 		32 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros AR9287 (2T2R)	Atheros AR9341 (2T2R)
Antenae(s):	2 Removables x 3dBi	2 Removables x 3dBi
Ethernet:	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100
USB:		1 x 2.0 		1 x 2.0
